title: haven't been following league for a while, just logged in and got a mystery gift from Riot
body: I only play like 1 or 2 games every now and then, but haven't been following league, what happened ?

replies.body: Welcome back!  It looks like the toast was indeed for Riot Kayle, which was for League's [anniversary ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you)as SteveTheMiner mentioned.  Into the fray, friend!
May I ask what that mystery gift was?
Oh yes. Kayle and Riot Kayle was given out to players that played within a week during the 10 year anniversary for League of Legends.
oh nice, lucky that I did play
